summary: Comprehensive testing of Client CRUD with extended fields (phone, address, city, state, zip, contact_person, contact_title, website, notes) and Edit Client functionality. All features working correctly.

issues: Console warning: HTML hydration error - <span> cannot be child of <tbody>. This is caused by Emergent's visual editor injecting span elements - NOT an application code bug. Non-blocking.

seed_data_creation: Created test client 'Test Company 35aeec' during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Client CRUD extended fields are working. Edit Client modal is fully functional. Client orders history tab shows orders correctly.

edit_client_modal.pre_fill: Working - form pre-populated with existing client data
edit_client_modal.save_changes: Working - shows success toast and updates data

client_detail_page.header_info: Client name, email, phone, industry, status badges, revenue stats
client_detail_page.contact_info_display: Shows email, phone, website, industry, address
client_detail_page.primary_contact_display: Shows contact person name and title when available

client_orders_tab.orders_displayed: Shows order ID, items, total, status, due date, created date

orders_page.stats: Total Orders (3), Open Orders (2), Delivered (1), Total Value ($3,867.50)
orders_page.expandable_rows: Working - shows line items with product, qty, unit price, line total
orders_page.order_summary: Shows subtotal, tax rate, tax amount, total, notes

roles_page.each_role_shows: Name, member count, description, permissions badges

clients_page.stats: Total Clients (6), Active Clients (100%), Lifetime Revenue ($16,105), Avg Reorder Rate (2.4x/year)
